Epos Direct LLC is the leading supplier of quality EPOS Till systems for Retail and Hospitality businesses in the UK. We have a huge range of stock ready and available in many cases to ship out and field engineers to carry out installation and training of the EPOS till systems. Just select your business type and we have created simple, great value epos system packages starting from as little as£899.
